scripts.build: browserify js/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-object-rest-spread ] ] -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify -o static/assets/livesite/bundle.js
scripts.watch: watchify js/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-object-rest-spread ] ] -d -o static/assets/livesite/bundle.js -v
scripts.devserver: beefy --cwd=static/ --index=static/index.html js/index.js:assets/livesite/bundle.js -- -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-object-rest-spread ] ] -d -o static/assets/livesite/bundle.js -v
